todos.title: Authenticity
todos.body: Product is guaranteed to be real and safe.

todos.title: Patronage
todos.body: People want to pay the artist entrepreneur even when they could get it for free through piracy.

todos.title: Accessibility
todos.body: Improves our ability to find what we need quickly.

todos.title: Findability
todos.body: Helps customers broadcast their existence so that other people can find them.

todos.title: Immediacy
todos.body: Helps customers be the first to experience/know something.

todos.title: Embodiment
todos.body: Has a physical component to it, we receive something tangible.

todos.title: Value Proposition Limit
todos.body: Don’t try to be everything to everyone.
